Uses of Class
unidue.ub.statistics.alert.ReaderControl

  • Packages that use ReaderControl 
    Package Description
    unidue.ub.statistics.alert
    Contains tools for for alerting services and digest readers for example for requests hitlists

    • Uses of ReaderControl in unidue.ub.statistics.alert

      Methods in unidue.ub.statistics.alert that return ReaderControl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReaderControl ReaderControl.buildFromReaderControl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      reads the parameters from the http request to modify the corresponding fields of the reader control.
      ReaderControl ReaderControl.readFromDisk(java.lang.String readerControl, java.lang.String who)
      builds the ReaderControl by reading the file associated with the given alertControl from disk.
